REC: https://www.recregistryindia.nic.in/index.php/general/publics/registered_regens

2.3 Interviews

After the review of the Monitoring Report and documents a site visit was carried out on 14 & 15- October-2015. During the site visit physical inspection of the project components followed by interviews with the on-site personnel was carried out to verify the project details. A follow-up meeting was also conducted with the project representatives. The following persons were interviewed

Name Designation Company Interview Topics Mr. Sunil Lalwani Orange Renewable Project Design, Technical Asst. Manager Details, Monitoring procedure, Mr. Hardeep Orange Renewable Incidents during the Sr. Engineer monitoring period. Mr. Rameswar RVPNL Monitoring points, Procedure A.Er, for calculation of net meter, JMR generation Mr. Vamsi Krishna Kosher Climate Technical details, ER Consultant calculations, Reporting
